categories.summary: The chat contains a single message from user "ash" about profiling memory usage in Node.js. The user points out that profiling Node.js applications is more challenging than profiling browser applications, but suggests using the built-in `process.memoryUsage()` method or creating heap snapshots that can be viewed in a browser for memory analysis.

## 1. Summary
The chat segment contains a brief technical discussion about implementing animation hyps (hyperparameters) in what appears to be a 3D modeling or animation software. The conversation reveals that animation hyps only work with skinned meshes, and the complete implementation requires parenting the skinned mesh to an empty object. A user mentions that this process was more straightforward in a previous version (V1) of the software.
